CustomField.description: BA: NPLMA - Determines if an Assigned Crew record is a foreman or default crew member, used to pull in correct crew members on JHA
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Employee__r.SFS_User_Profile_Name__c !='Foreman', Default_Crew__c = TRUE, ISBLANK( Removed_Date__c)), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Default Foreman
